name: SHORT-TERM HEMODIALYSIS CATHETERS
description:
## FEATURES
- Soft tip: Tapered tip facilitates ease of insertion without use of peel-away sheath. Reduces vessel trauma during insertion
- Radiopaque: Radiopaque, facilitates quick visualization under X-Ray.
- Side holes: 2.5cm far from end hole reduces recircling and wall-suction. Minimizes risk of clot formation
- Rotatable Suture Wing: Facilitates skin inspection. Avoid blood vessel wall-suction. Minimizes risk of exit infections. No tube-kinking occured
- Silicone Extension Tube: Increases patient comfort, will not crimp over time, able to visualize fluid
- Compound-packaging Tray: Various Accessories for choice
- Multi-lumen available: Single, double, triple lumen
- Inline Clamps: good flexibility. damage resistant. printed priming volumes
- Made from PU (medical grade): Better flexibility and anti-kinking performance
- Thermosensitive: softens as it warms to body temperature
- Smooth inside an outside surface: avoid clot formation
- Marking on catheter available
- Pre-curved Type: More comfortable on patients
